meanings.definition: A white, crystalline compound used in photography and as a reducing agent.
meanings.sent1: The photographer used pyrogallol to develop the pictures.
meanings.sent2: I learned in science class that pyrogallol is important in photography.
meanings.sent3: Why did the camera refuse to work? Because it ran out of pyrogallol!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like pyrogallol, developing new ideas with each click of the shutter.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pyrogallol in the darkroom lingered long after the photos were printed.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound with the formula C6H3(OH)3.
meanings.sent1: The scientist mixed pyrogallol with other chemicals for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Pyrogallol is a key ingredient in many chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: Why did the test tube blush? Because it saw the pyrogallol's formula!
meanings.sent4: His words were like pyrogallol, reacting strongly with everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The bubbling mixture of pyrogallol and acids fascinated the students in the lab.
